summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of PhotoGallery component with 3 styled views (Memory Archive, Typography Collage, Minimalist Story). All gallery features working correctly including view mode toggle, styled layouts, preview buttons, and lightbox navigation.

notes.note: Photos display as placeholders when R2 presigned URLs fail for non-existent S3 keys. This is expected behavior - real uploaded photos will have valid URLs.

passed_tests: Frontend: PhotoGallery component renders with view mode toggle (Grid vs Styled)
Frontend: Grid view shows standard photo grid with preview buttons on each photo
Frontend: Styled view renders different layouts based on galleryStyle prop
Frontend: Memory Archive style shows scattered polaroid-style layout with rotation effects and photo numbers
Frontend: Typography Collage style shows bold colored grid (yellow/orange/red/purple) with text overlays (LOVE/JOY/LIFE/FUN)
Frontend: Minimalist Story style shows clean Instagram-style grid with progress dots and 'moments captured' text
Frontend: Preview button (Eye icon) on each photo opens styled preview lightbox
Frontend: Styled preview lightbox shows image with style-specific frame/background (Memory Archive has dark bg with polaroid frame)
Frontend: EventDetails page passes flipbook_style to PhotoGallery component correctly
Frontend: Download All button visible in all view modes
Frontend: Lightbox navigation (prev/next) works correctly with arrow keys
Frontend: Lightbox thumbnail strip shows all photos
Frontend: View mode toggle switches between Grid and Styled views
Frontend: Style name badge displays when in Styled view mode
critical_code_review_comments: PhotoGallery.js implements all 3 gallery styles correctly with distinct visual layouts
Memory Archive: Polaroid frames with rotation effects, scattered grid layout, photo numbers
Typography Collage: Bold colored backgrounds, text overlays, numbered badges
Minimalist Story: Clean Instagram-style grid, progress dots, 'moments captured' footer
View mode toggle correctly switches between standard grid and styled views
Preview button (Eye icon) opens styled preview lightbox with style-specific backgrounds
Lightbox navigation supports keyboard (ArrowLeft/Right/Escape) and click navigation
EventDetails.js correctly passes galleryStyle={event.flipbook_style || 'memory_archive'} to PhotoGallery
seed_data_creation: Test users, events, and photos created during testing were cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: PhotoGallery component with 3 styled views is fully functional. All styles (memory_archive, typography_collage, minimalist_story) render correctly with distinct visual layouts. View mode toggle, preview buttons, and lightbox navigation all working. Photos appear as placeholders when R2 URLs are invalid - this is expected for test data without actual uploaded images.
